name: ReviewNinja
description: ReviewNinja - merge with confidence. A code review tool that integrates into GitHub.

PROTOCOL.description: The protocol your application uses, can be either 'http' or 'https'.

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

GITHUB_CLIENT.description: Client ID of your GitHub Application. You can create a new application here: https://github.com/settings/applications/new.

GITHUB_SECRET.description: Client Secret of your GitHub Application.

GITHUB_PROTOCOL.description: The protocol of your target GitHub instance. Defaults to 'https'.

GITHUB_API_HOST.description: The API endpoint of your target GitHub instance. Defaults to 'api.github.com'.

GITHUB_API_PATHPREFIX.description: The path prefix for the API endpoint of your target GitHub instance. For example '/api/v3' would be appended to 'company.github.com' resulting in 'company.github.com/api/v3'.

GITHUB_VERSION.description: The API version of your target GitHub instance to use. Defaults to '3.0.0'.

GITHUB_USER.description: Required if you wish for a 'ReviewNinja' user to comment on PRs.

GITHUB_PASS.description: Required if you wish for a 'ReviewNinja' user to comment on PRs. Generate a token here: https://github.com/settings/tokens/new. Only public_repo is necessary.
